scripts.browserify: browserify src/index.tsx -o lib/traversal-embed.js -s traversal -p [ tsify ] -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env @babel/preset-typescript @babel/preset-react ] --plugins [ @babel/proposal-class-properties @babel/proposal-object-rest-spread @babel/plugin-transform-runtime ] ] -g [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -g uglifyify | terser --compress --mangle
scripts.build: npm run browserify && npm run minify
